text: int main ( ) { short t , n , i , j , max_sum ; scanf ( "%hd" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%hd" , & n ) ; short a [ n + 1 ] [ n + 1 ] ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 1 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%hd" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } max_sum = 0 ; for ( i = 2 ; i <= n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 1 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { if ( j > 1 ) { if ( j < i ) { a [ i ] [ j ] += max ( a [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] , a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] ) ; } else { a [ i ] [ j ] += a [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] ; } } else { a [ i ] [ j ] += a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] ; } if ( a [ i ] [ j ] > max_sum ) max_sum = a [ i ] [ j ] ; } } printf ( "%hd\n" , max_sum ) ; } return 0 ; }
